entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
